item.title: Review of AMA with BlockArk
item.description: At 7pm on September 17th, Stegos founder Joel conducted a 100-minute AMA live broadcast in the community and broadcasted it simultaneously in 9 communities, watching up to 4,500 people, sharing the twists and turns of Joel’s creation of Stegos. Stegos technical dry goods and on-site Q&A discussions are very exciting. Let’s review the text records of last night~ This guest for this time is Joel, who is the founder of Stegos, an experienced hacker and blockchain pioneer.
